trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around May 23rd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI Just saw it from my balcony. Estimated size about 10 meters. Continuesly accelerating and decelerating while moving in a circular path. It emmits a very low frequency ,almost subsonic, noise. Many people now are observing from the street. Even some cars stopped and drivers exited to observe it better. Took some photos with mobile phone. I'm little scared. Don't know if It's safe to observe and what may happen next. Will try to take more photos and upload as soon as possible
Summary: triangular equilateral with 7 orange lights and glowing yellowish
